title: App doesn't work
body:
Ok tried reinstalling it few times but its always the same, after app starts up there is brief display of main menu but then it instantly goes into this and does nothing how long i wouldnt wait.
http://oi63.tinypic.com/2ebscyd.jpg
I have phone with android 5.0.1 but its semi custom build that huawei puts into their phones (Emui) so Maybe thats the issue, i dunno.

replies.body:
Hey Irimort,

Sorry to see you're having this issue. Phones sometimes get bundled with slightly different browsers that handle webpages differently. Google has been trying to standardize these versions a bit by adding an upgradeable app to the play store: [Android System Webview](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.google.android.webview&hl=en). 

Installing/updating this package and rebooting your device might help solve this issue. If you are still seeing the same thing afterwards, please let us know. We're also going to do some digging on our end to see what might be causing this to begin with.

I had it up to date all along, tried reinstalling it but to no effect.
Intrestingly enough ive got two system apps called android system webview
http://oi66.tinypic.com/be6kp4.jpg
But both are updated and also tried to turn each of them off to see if they dont conflict with each other but nope still the same.

Hi,
Same issue here. I downloaded the Android System Webview, rebooted and nothing happened, the app is still frozen as seen on top. 
Any news what may eb causing the issue? App was working well until one day it stopped. I wasn't updating phone software or anything, I can't link this to anything on my end :(

Would you mind posting some information about what phone you have/android version? Any extra information will help us track this down. We did recently update the login page to give it a bit of a facelift, so something new might not be playing nice with your setup.

Hi, I have Meizu MX5 with 5.1 Android,  and custom Meizu os Flyme version 5.1.5. 
Thanks for all your feedback, please let me know if you require any additional information. Thanks :)

Hey MădWife,
We have released an update to the login page that will hopefully fix this issue for you. This doesn't require an app update or anything, the currently installed version should be fine. If you could try it out again and let us know, that would be great!

Thanks for helping us track this down.
Awesome guys, thanks! It works now :)
I have same problem, android 5.1, phone is meizu m2 mini, flyme os 4.5.4, hope this info helps
Ye it seems like the app is strugling to display login screen which i suppose is taken from main site through it, and it fails to do so for some reason

Hey guys,
We have released an update to the login page that will hopefully fix this issue for you. This doesn't require an app update or anything, the currently installed version should be fine. If you could try it out again and let us know, that would be great!

Thanks for helping us track this down.

Android 4.4.4. I have a Galaxy tab 3V. I tried opening the auth.riotgames.com link in both Crome and Firefox. Firefox crashed. Once I solve the captcha on the app, it directs to a browser. The link that opens is long and has some parameters for a second but then reverts to just auth.riotgames.com and the loading screen. Tried reinstalling the app but still has the same problem.

Thx for update, it indeed helped, now it managed to display login screen and let me in. Everything seem to work just fine
Good job :-)
Hi. Same issue here. Tried to install android system webview but still nothing. I have Ulefone power with android 5.1 .

I had the same issue, but the Android system webview fixed my issue
My phone is Samsung galaxy express 2
running cyanogen mod Android 5.1.1
